original_title: MP Imtiaz Bakeer Markar launches the book ’’Sithamu’’
original_body_lines: The book “Sithamu ( Let’s think ) written by Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) MP Imtiaz Bakeer Markar was launched at Sri Lanka Foundation Institute (SLFI) amidst a distinguished gathering today. Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardene. The book comprises the columns which have been written by the MP. Pix by Nisal Baduge
